data.text: We’re hiring a Digital Content Editor! Apply if you have experience working with CMS, a positive mindset, and self-motivation. Enjoy flexible working hours, travel benefits, and career growth opportunities in a growing, sustainable and innovative airline: https://t.co/tIK8JT824m https://t.co/k5YRikVms8

A famous quote from Leonardo da Vinci says: “Once you have tasted flight, you will forever walk the earth with your eyes turned skyward.” ⛅️ 
In this #airBalticQuiz we are curious – how old were you when you first experienced the excitement of the flight? 🤩

data.text: On your next visit to Riga, complement your trip with a tour of Cēsis. It’s a true gem to discover and we’re proud to feature it as the second #NFT in our #cryptoart collection! Read our blog for more ideas for your trip to Cēsis: https://t.co/UwdOu94Dhg https://t.co/s3tSY5uesA

We've welcomed spring in full bloom! 

Photo by 📷 Kristīne Limare https://t.co/ViyFYJgYgz

#DidYouKnow that it's not always the Captain flying the aircraft? During the pre-flight stage both pilots decide who is going to be flying which sector. Normally, on a 4 sector day it's gonna be a 50/50 split. https://t.co/sH66eUrxFk

It's heart-warming to reunite with our beloved staff. We have started a re-hiring process and will welcome back 20 former cabin crew. We are happy to see the demand for travel and human connections rising as it lets us to reconnect with our team again. https://t.co/P3TiAnBq3b https://t.co/jiZgtaAQjc

Our biggest flight sale of this year is here! Our green tails are ready to fly you to over 60 destinations for very friendly prices. Choose your travel destination now: https://t.co/dXnUN0Ebal https://t.co/rmtttzhOIK
In this journey called life, family is forever. It’s where life begins and love never ends. Happy #InternationalDayOfFamilies! https://t.co/wWzL4el0Di

data.text: You can check our latest NFTs and purchase them here: https://t.co/MOv5qUjuth https://t.co/aG99JNKMwR

It's almost weekend and this can mean only one thing - #airBalticQuiz! 😊 Gastronomic tourism is a way of traveling by chasing and enjoying tastes of different cultures. We would like to know, do you prefer:

#DidYouKnow that today's newly announced flights to Corfu makes it our seventh destination in Greece? airBaltic will also perform flights to Athens, Thessaloniki, Santorini, Rhodes, Kos and Heraklion this year! https://t.co/2A8j8TxxBm

We are happy to announce, that starting from June 12 we will perform weekly summer seasonal flights between Riga and Greek island Corfu. The route will be performed in cooperation with Mouzenidis Travel and will be available for purchase on our website: https://t.co/d7QUmGuZ39 https://t.co/5M5ExNvusH

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: Dear passengers, we are approaching summer! Book your sunny getaway to our new and enchanting destinations - Valencia in Spain, Pisa in Italy, and Kos in Greece. Book now for prices as low as 75€ for a roundtrip and travel from July 2021! https://t.co/9tIwzehEKt https://t.co/glQn2bOyNY

If you love to process & analyze a high volume of data, have experience working with HR databases, and are open to new challenges every day, @airBaltic might be the place for you! Apply here: https://t.co/TOsRlYeqoU https://t.co/JCaIpxvRaV

#DidYouKnow that there's a difference between leasing conditions in the aviation?
Wet-lease is any leasing arrangement whereby a company agrees to provide an aircraft and at least one pilot to another company, however dry-lease refers to leasing only the aircraft. https://t.co/fwHAT1vmhP

🇱🇻 Svinot Latvijas Republikas Neatkarības atjaunošanas dienu, esam patiesi lepni, ka šo skaisto zemi varam saukt par savām mājām. Saules mūžu Latvijai! 
📷 autors Edgars Trankalis https://t.co/RvhhJ70GCt

🇱🇻 Our spirits fly high today as we celebrate the Day of the Restoration of Independence of the Republic of Latvia. Let us take a moment to appreciate how fortunate we are to call this magnificent land our home. 📷 by Edgars Trankalis. https://t.co/5nezpil5jl

data.text: Gandrīz ikvienā @airBaltic reisā bagāžas nodalījumā ceļo ne vien pasažieru somas, bet arī pasta sūtījumi un kravas. Pārvadājot vēstules, dzīvībai svarīgu medicīnas aprīkojumu un pat mājas mīluļus, mēs gādājam, lai mēs būtu #SavienotiArPasauli https://t.co/NsVqy1b6Kd https://t.co/yCc54Nltg7

On nearly every @airBaltic flight, the luggage compartment carries not just the passengers’ bags, but mail and cargo too. From carrying letters to loved ones to medical equipment and even pets - we are here because #ConnectivityIsEssential https://t.co/q6b75Odnvt https://t.co/hmTst9iUAI

Happy International Pilot's day to all pilots out there! 👩‍✈️👨‍✈️

Today we celebrate the crucial importance of pilot's contribution to the aviation industry and thank all @airBaltic pilots for flying us safely and on time! https://t.co/t2BdyPvEJS

data.text: As of April 24th, no self-isolation will be required for passengers arriving to Latvia directly from the UK and Iceland. We are still recommending all our passengers to travel for essential reasons only. Find travel information related to Covid-19 here: https://t.co/u4OySMQEYL https://t.co/SLywvdjCWZ
It’s another Friday – which means it’s #airBalticQuiz time! Have you heard of such activity as “Aircraft spotting”? 🤔 Can you guess what does that mean and stand for?

Our growth continues! We have signed a land reservation agreement with @riga_airport for building a new Baltic Cargo Hub. It will be the largest air cargo handling facility in the Baltics, enabling us to handle more than 30 000 tonnes of cargo each year. https://t.co/aKEMT9NQXE https://t.co/ATssFb7ZpW

We are glad to announce a new baggage allowance for our passengers as of today! Feel free to take advantage of 23kg checked baggage with GREEN Classic and GREEN Plus reservations free of charge: https://t.co/3th4ud0GHQ https://t.co/wgd75YzyUj

data.text: For athletes, the chance to travel in these times is not a whim, but a question of their career. We talked with alpine skier Liene Bondare and Jānis Straupe from @lhf_lv to find out why #ConnectivityIsEssential in professional sports. https://t.co/9EQyMKWROu https://t.co/nvGyEUxeT2

We are happy to offer essential connectivity between the Baltics and the world! In April we fly to 33 destinations - daily flights to Amsterdam, weekly flights to Nordic capitals, Paris, London and Frankfurt and more flights to Southern Europe: https://t.co/yaA2j2mVNK https://t.co/YFnnlbAEHI

Savienojam uzvarai! 🏒 Šodien mums bija gods uzņemt Latvijas hokeja izlasi valsts karoga YL-CSL gaisa kuģī, lai pavadītu ceļā uz Pasaules čempionāta pārbaudes spēlēm Slovākijā. Turam īkšķus un jūtam līdzi! https://t.co/v2PU8ki3Wf
Thanks for participating! 😊 65% of you got the answer right. Tenerife is one of the seven main Canary islands! Are you ready to explore this corner of paradise? 😎

data.text: If you are an analytical thinker with excellent communication skills and want to contribute to the success of a growing, sustainable and innovative airline - join @airBaltic and lift your career as an Internal Control Projects Manager. Apply here: https://t.co/I4pE6rs4b2 https://t.co/7H7Hu2eTKw

What is the difference between aircraft technician and aircraft mechanic? How to get a job in aviation and is it really true that you fall in love with aviation for life? Find out the answers in the latest interview with our technician Vladislavs. https://t.co/xsvOBm4vGJ https://t.co/AC6xbZFm3g

#airBalticQuiz is back! 🤗 This week we have announced a new, beautiful and rather exotic destination – Tenerife, which is one of the Canary Islands. 🏝 Do you know how many main islands there are in this archipelago?

Due to the historical negative impact caused by the pandemic, airBaltic group closed 2020 with a revenue of EUR 143 million, which was 72% less than the year before. Despite the severe travel restrictions, airBaltic carried 1.34 million passengers: https://t.co/NaUrZfGy67 https://t.co/SZERaZkbDT

Šis ir stāsts par Lienes Svokas ģimeni - to, kā pandēmija viņu nošķīra no vīra, bet ar @airBaltic gādību abi atkal varēja satikties. Esam patiesi priecīgi, ka bijām un esam #SavienotiArPasauli, ka varējām palīdzēt Lienes ģimenei atgriezties mājās. https://t.co/utTNpSQ9uk https://t.co/5fTAj2LePO

data.text:
airBaltic NFTs are live and available for purchase! 🔔 
The first #NFTs with Kuldiga #cryptoart are available on @opensea marketplace for a fixed price in #ether. Check out our 100 unique collectibles of the Edition 1! https://t.co/6ME2BbbCNT https://t.co/H3JKTQD2Av
#DidYouKnow that our newest route from Riga to Tenerife will take 4511 km long journey making it the longest and furthest airBaltic direct flight? https://t.co/GujmB1xgl0

Great news for passengers who seek a guaranteed holiday in the sun! Starting on September 2, we plan to launch new scheduled flights between Riga and Tenerife in Spain. We'll fly to the largest island in the Canary Islands archipelago three times weekly: https://t.co/ZF8w4IKQ9I https://t.co/vkzzkKwx54

data.text: The first airBaltic #NFTs will be issued on @opensea marketplace on April 14 at 12:00 PM GMT / 03:00 PM Riga time. We will issue a total of 100 collectibles of edition 1 for a fixed price in Ether. Read more: https://t.co/6ME2BbbCNT  #blockchain #cryptocurrencies #cryptoart https://t.co/M7WUHis7z5

Starting of June 4, we'll be performing two weekly flights between Riga and Edinburgh. The aesthetically pleasing capital of Scotland is worth exploring - from the majestic buildings and gardens to countless of fascinating museums. See the flight schedule: https://t.co/T7xDf5YFYO https://t.co/RjIspPJPUw

Take a look at some of the sustainability goals reached in the past months with February being the month of peace, justice, and strong institutions and March standing for goals to help the environment. Read more about our sustainability: https://t.co/j8BUHxKHvM https://t.co/3L6MI7k34U

Scenic and authentic is what characterize our new destination Naples! Lying on one of the most beautiful bays in Italy, this rough diamond will surprise you with plenty of art, history and incredible Italian food. Two weekly flights will start on June 4. https://t.co/DfQnlMKHS9 https://t.co/GILewcI2PE

Lidmašīnu astes mākoņos ļauj saglabāt cerību daudziem, īpaši cilvēkiem, kuriem nepieciešami medicīnas pakalpojumi ārvalstīs. Mēs runājām ar @bernuslimnica un mūsu klienti Larisu, lai atklātu, cik nozīmīga ir apziņa, ka esam #SavienotiArPasauli https://t.co/TCMhzdSO8p https://t.co/g0MvLPcsiT

We spoke with @bernuslimnica and our client Larisa who revealed the importance of knowing that you can still fly with @airBaltic if the need arises. Read the story behind the ticket to find out why #ConnectivityIsEssential: https://t.co/qTtZjCzhsL https://t.co/ysCpE1ZJth

Excited to expand our leisure destinations list with the picture postcard perfect Greek island Santorini. Let's visit the white washed cliff-side towns and go chasing the magical sunsets. As of June 5, we plan to connect Riga and Santorini once a week ✈️ https://t.co/diTZrYce0C https://t.co/DIsNyg48DY

data.text: We are thrilled to announce that we will become the world’s first airline to issue non-fungible tokens! We will issue collector #NFTs showcasing @Airbus A220-300 as well as a piece of art of one of the most beloved Latvian cities: https://t.co/Sj83vib243 #blockchain #cryptoart https://t.co/mJp4I6J1Gp

We have a new destination on our route map - it's Heraklion, the capital of Greek island of Crete. A very popular holiday destination with picturesque streets and artifacts that attract history enthusiasts. Two weekly flights will start as of May 15. https://t.co/reCVC7dMuW https://t.co/8mhklPYk26

Great news for passengers traveling between Russia and Europe! We have resumed flights from Riga to ✈️ Moscow https://t.co/HJHjL9l5Th ✈️ and Saint Petersburg: https://t.co/sotzEPjsV1 

Please check the entry and transit restrictions before your travel: https://t.co/SiFALTX6ej https://t.co/KedJTmfcPu

data.text:
Happy Easter everyone! ☀️

We wish you a joyous spring and celebration filled with love and meaningful blessings! https://t.co/4OKaTTM1Lg

Mums ir svarīgi turpināt lidot, nodrošinot drošus pakalpojumus pasažieriem un savienojot Baltiju ar pasauli. Skaties video un uzzini, kāpēc airBaltic jāturpina darbība un kādas izmaksas rada lidmašīnu neizmantošana. https://t.co/IoBO06bx8q

It is important for us to keep flying, ensuring safe air travel and connectivity to Baltic states. Watch the video and learn more about why airBaltic needs to continue operations and how the downtime for the fleet is costing more than operating it. https://t.co/DUyTEgrMdK
We're launching new direct flights between @TLLairport and @MUC_Airport! Three weekly flights between the two cities will start as of May 1st!✈️ https://t.co/99tmfvwicq

Mums ir jāturpina būt savienotiem ar pasauli. Daudziem lidojumi šobrīd nozīmē cerību, komfortu un drošības sajūtu. Mēs esam šeit, lai rūpētos par jūsu vajadzībām šobrīd, un apsolām būt šeit, kad dzīve ritēs ierasto gaitu, lai turpinātu gādāt par drošiem lidojumiem. https://t.co/LS8omAhYqT

#ConnectivityIsEssential and for many flying brings hope, comfort, and safety. We’re here to cater to your needs today and we promise to keep carrying travellers safely when the world opens up again. https://t.co/Ku8sS5aPK8

data.text: In 2014, we became the world’s first airline to accept Bitcoin payments for flight tickets. Now, in cooperation with service provider @BitPay, we accept also other cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin Cash, Ether and Dogecoin for bookings made on our website: https://t.co/dEYDU2KhDD https://t.co/2xHyyAK1Fz

We are looking for a Non-Destructive Testing Inspector and Non-Destructive Testing Apprenticeship to join our team and become future detectives of the manufacturing world ensuring safety and reliability of various aircraft parts. Apply here: https://t.co/nEodx4AUEv https://t.co/Efbg9EfiXG

We are pleased to expand our connectivity and offer our travellers a new destination – enchanting and luxurious Dubai in United Arab Emirates! The new flights will be performed four times weekly starting this September: https://t.co/9FS2xILSxg https://t.co/fr795G1Lrn

Join us today, on March 24, at 12.00 (GMT)/14.00 (Riga time) in the public webinar by @Gaussm, the President and CEO of airBaltic. To join the event, please click here: https://t.co/M0iIGOuqUf https://t.co/zJzQLi2iEX

data.text: This year during Easter we will offer flights to more than 30 destinations. We constantly monitor the situation in our destinations and for now, we welcome on board those passengers who must travel for essential and urgent reasons only: https://t.co/ZSYGL7q0tN https://t.co/lkX2Gc7VJw

Our airline is more than just taking passengers from point A to B. More than a thousand local and international professionals. More than 400 high-tech positions. More smoothness and more safety while taking you to the places you need the most. https://t.co/0lnWpfL5XS

On March 24, we will be hosting a live webinar where CEO @Gaussm will give a clear overview of how the airline is flying out of the crisis, how the company works during these unprecedented times, and what is planned for the future. Learn more: https://t.co/z9t0vLrogU https://t.co/UdnRI3zTFJ

Thanks for participating! 🤗 Exactly 50% of you tapped the right answer! Pilots used to carry a surprisingly heavy weight of 10 – 15 kg with them just to ensure that all of the necessary flight documents are in the reach of their hands.

Spēcīga, starptautiski atzīta un pelnoša lidsabiedrība ir vērtīgs ieguvums ekonomikai. Nacionālā lidsabiedrība sniedz ieguvumus dažādām nozarēm un sabiedrības daļām, nodrošinot transporta savienojamību, darbu un izglītību. Uzzini vairāk: https://t.co/duvNs62ykI https://t.co/Tmukl0xe8X

A strong, profitable and internationally respected airline is a valuable asset for the economy. National carrier benefits various industries and communities, providing connectivity, resources and education. Learn more: https://t.co/kKWOtZCI29 https://t.co/FwVAzqnLhM

data.text: Hey, #airBalticQuiz! We just introduced you with a new project of electronic operational flight plans. Back in 2014 airBaltic implemented iPads for pilots, allowing them to avoid carrying heavy packages of important flight documents. 🗃 Can you guess how heavy they used to be? 🤔

How the new strategy has changed airline's business going forward? Read @flightradar24 interview with @airBaltic CEO @Gaussm to learn more of how the industry will shape up in years to come. https://t.co/VHGYeLfAZV

data.text:
We're incredibly proud to be recognized as the best employer in the transport and logistics sector for the 10th year in a row! 

We've received this award following a nationwide survey carried out by the recruitment agency @cvlv. 

Read more: https://t.co/GIzxQddyXb https://t.co/0rb3GCDlSn

#DidYouKnow that white stripes on pilot's uniform represents their rank? There are different rankings around the world, but normally Captain (seated on the left) wears 4 stripes while First Officer (seated on the right) wears 3 stripes. https://t.co/MybkTcBJK6

data.text: We've introduced a new sustainability project, replacing pilot briefing packages with electronic operational flight plans. This will save vast amounts of printed paper as @airBaltic pilots will be able to access them on their iPads. Read more: https://t.co/VtDlKVLRQc https://t.co/vc2mWsfEFo

We're proud @airBaltic has been recognized by the web-based service provider @chaviation as the winner of the Europe's Youngest Aircraft Fleet Award 2021. In the global top, we ranked in 5th place with an average fleet age of 2.40 years. Read more: https://t.co/tDjEoKlBud https://t.co/vaMzWPQJ1F

This time only 41% of you clicked the right answer. March is a month of “Climate Action”. We have encouraged our employees to join the @WWF challenge, rising more awareness towards the Earth rehabilitation and the stabilization of climate. 🌍

data.text: Starting from March 17, @airBaltic resumes flights from Riga to Kyiv and vice versa for those passengers that are travelling for essential reasons. There will be two flights per week until March 28 when the frequency will increase to four weekly flights: https://t.co/zHLC0UoERm https://t.co/kwinUQs61v

Hello, #airBalticQuiz! In October 2020, we launched our Sustainability Development Goals calendar, highlighting and contributing to resolving issues related to specific sustainable development goals. 🌱 Can you guess the main topic of March in our calendar? 🤔

“Mēs esam šeit šodien, lai nodrošinātu nepieciešamo savienojamību, un būsim arī rīt, lai sniegtu pasaules līmeņa pārvadājumus un parūpētos par Jums, kamēr esat lidojumos kopā ar mums.”
Lasi vairāk airBaltic izpilddirektora @Gaussm vēstulē: https://t.co/QKhHHOt7c9 https://t.co/yzjPOvO9h3

"We are here today to serve your travellers’ needs; we will be there tomorrow to deliver a world-class product and to take care of you while you are on board on one of our flights.”
Read the special message from our CEO, @Gaussm: https://t.co/D4DpCzbRjN https://t.co/HyEuyfwf5c

#DidYouKnow that pilots undergo simulator training at least every 6 months to improve and refresh the knowledge of non-standard situations? During Covid-19 time, additional simulator sessions for pilots are actively planned. https://t.co/8wDJK4KxIm

data.text:
@IATA Thanks for participating! Almost all of you (84%) were correct and chose the right answer - the official 2 letter IATA designator code of airBaltic is BT! You can also see it on our flight numbers! ✈️
But now let's jump right into this week - have a great one! 🤗

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: We're among the first airlines in the world to trial the global @IATA Travel Pass solution for cross border travel. This mobile app will help passengers to manage their travel easily in line with government requirements for COVID-19 tests or vaccines. https://t.co/o1VCb6Ykue https://t.co/EiM0Uick4M

#DidYouKnow that airBaltic currently has 24 codeshare partners? It is an agreement between two airlines, where one operates the flight and other markets this flight and issue tickets for it. This gives our passengers broader route network and better connectivity for flights. https://t.co/Ikh0CS9SnW
Thanks for participating! Majority of you (76%) picked the right answer - the aviation summer season this year starts on March 28th! Have you found your sunglasses? 😎

Weekend and #airBalticQuiz is here! We can finally feel the spring hanging around the corner, which means that the official start of the summer season in aviation is not that far away. ☀️ Can you guess when it starts this year?
